page.title: 14MUSBURY VALLEY, HELMSHORE.
page.content:
We have a valley in Helmshore, called Musbury Valley. It is full of beautiful countryside. There is a race called the Tor Mile, which involves Musbury Valley. You run up a path which leads to the Tor, then you go to the top and then come down again.
There is a lot of wild life, such as rabbits, geese, fish and other animals. Musbury also supplies the water for Helmshore, because it holds the local reservoir. It is very quiet and peaceful, making it an attractive place for picnics.
There are nine farms along the Musbury Valley, but some of them are in ruins. The ruins form the main landmarks along the valley.
